generated_description: talk about culture and enjoy the store, also known as changhai international culture and publishing group, is a company based in taichung, taiwan. the company focuses on promoting reading, recommending books, and cultivating talent. it participates in international book fairs, such as the beijing international book fair, and has received recognition for its publications, including the award-winning "little da vinci" from the ministry of culture's 41st selection of recommended books for primary and secondary school students. the company offers a variety of books and educational materials, including popular titles like "little da vinci" and "crossing earth for 4.6 billion years."
generated_business_tags: re-enactment of world history | talent development | book fair participation | reading promotion | book recommendations | literary and art worlds | picture book | bestselling books | museum of the world
